topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5584a8a5636872324d000004#post_5584a8a5636872324d000004
when i was younger i never acted like people my age, i remember when in school we had to do a project that involved cutting out magazines and some of the guys in my class had found a picture of a bikini model going "HEE HEE HEE BEWBIES BEWBIES OMG LIEK SO HAWT LELELELELELEL" and i was just like "youre all a bunch of fucking morons" and every guy in my class acted like huge clowns which resulted in me constantly threatening everyone and giving them the middle finger, hanging out with girls was never an option for me either considering how i can barely relate to any of them. thankfully after i went to a private school for a few years that ended up fixing me around and i made a few friends there who i still occassionally talk to after i moved (and im about to move again).
topics.author: 4ffbfff37f123b072a01bb5b
